data.comment: The first-half is now underway.
Ball safe as Yokohama FC is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 3, Throw-in for Yokohama FC in the half of Nagoya.
Nagoya needs to be cautious. Yokohama FC have an attacking throw-in.
Ball goes out of play for a Nagoya goal kick.
In the minute 4, Throw-in Nagoya.
Yokohama FC have a goal kick.
Nagoya drive forward at breakneck speed but are pulled up for offside.
Can Yokohama FC get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Nagoya's half?
In the minute 10, Play has been temporarily suspended for attention to Yuichi Maruyama for Nagoya who is writhing in pain on the pitch.
Goal kick for Nagoya at NHK Spring MitsuzawaFootballStadium.
In the minute 11, Yuichi Maruyama is back on his feet again.
Nagoya to take a throw-in in Yokohama FC territory.
Goal! Yutaka Yoshida gives Nagoya a 0-1 lead.
In the minute 16, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Yokohama.
It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Yokohama FC close to the penalty box.
In the minute 18, Kohei Tezuka (Yokohama FC) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Throw-in for Yokohama FC in their own half.
Goal! The home team draw level at 1-1 through Kosuke Saito.
In the minute 22, Goal! The home team take a 2-1 lead through Masakazu Tashiro.
Yokohama FC pushes forward through Yusuke Minagawa, whose finish on goal is saved.
Yokohama FC takes a corner from the left.
In the minute 27, Nagoya have a goal kick.
Yokohama FC awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Nagoya are caught offside.
In the minute 31, Throw-in for Nagoya in the half of Yokohama FC.
Goal kick for Nagoya at NHK Spring MitsuzawaFootballStadium.
Can Nagoya get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Yokohama FC's half?
In the minute 33, Yokohama FC drives forward and Reo Yasunaga gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Yokohama FC are pushing forward but Takuya Matsuura's finish is wide of the goal.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Yokohama.
In the minute 35, Koki Saito (Yokohama FC) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Corner awarded to Yokohama FC.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 39, Free kick for Nagoya in the half of Yokohama FC.
Throw-in for Yokohama FC at NHK Spring MitsuzawaFootballStadium.
Free kick Nagoya.
In the minute 45, 2 minutes of injury time will be added to the 1st half.
Nagoya awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Ball goes out of play for a Nagoya goal kick.
In the minute 45, The ref's whistle signals the end of the first-half.
The whistle has gone to start the second-half.
Gabriel Xavier (Nagoya) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 47, Throw-in for Yokohama FC at NHK Spring MitsuzawaFootballStadium.
Nagoya drive upfield and Yuki Soma gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Yokohama FC defender.
Throw-in high up the field for Nagoya in Yokohama.
In the minute 52, Sho Inagaki of Nagoya gets in a strike, but is off target.
Yokohama FC have a goal kick.
Nagoya to take a throw-in in Yokohama FC territory.
In the minute 54, It's a goal kick for the home team in Yokohama.
Throw-in Yokohama FC.
Nagoya takes a corner from the right.
In the minute 56, In Yokohama a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Nagoya's Mu Kanazaki is on target but unsuccessful.
Ball safe as Yokohama FC is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 59, Yokohama FC awarded a free kick in their own half.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Yusuke Matsuo is replacing Kosuke Saito for the home team.
In the minute 61, Kohei Tezuka (Yokohama FC) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Yokohama FC are whistled for offside.
In Yokohama a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 63, Nagoya to take a throw-in in Yokohama FC territory.
Nagoya make their first substitution with Joao Schmidt replacing Takuji Yonemoto.
Ryogo Yamasaki is on a sub for Gabriel Xavier for Nagoya.
In the minute 63, The away team replace Hiroyuki Abe with Mateus.
Throw-in for Yokohama FC in their own half.
Corner awarded to Nagoya.
In the minute 64, Nagoya's Mateus misses with an attempt on goal.
Goal kick for Yokohama FC at NHK Spring MitsuzawaFootballStadium.
Throw-in for Nagoya in the half of Yokohama FC.
In the minute 66, Yuji Senuma is replacing Yusuke Minagawa for the home team.
Kensuke Sato is on a sub for Kohei Tezuka for Yokohama FC.
Ryogo Yamasaki (Nagoya) wins the ball in the air but heads wide.
In the minute 67, Ball goes out of play for a Yokohama FC goal kick.
Yokohama FC awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in for Nagoya close to the penalty box.
In the minute 72, Throw-in for Yokohama FC in their own half.
Mu Kanazaki of Nagoya smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Nagoya are coming forward and Yuki Soma gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
In the minute 73, Mateus levels the score at 2-2.
That's a fine assist from Joao Schmidt.
Can Nagoya get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Yokohama FC's half?
In the minute 76, Nagoya have a dangerous throw-in.
Nagoya are pushing forward but Mateus's finish is wide of the goal.
Goal kick for Yokohama FC at NHK Spring MitsuzawaFootballStadium.
In the minute 77, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Yuji Senuma puts the ball in the net and the home team now lead 3-2.
Great play from Takuya Matsuura to set up the goal.
In the minute 80, Ryogo Yamasaki (Nagoya) is first to the ball but his header is off-target.
Ball goes out of play for a Yokohama FC goal kick.
Throw-in for Yokohama FC in the half of Nagoya.
In the minute 81, Throw-in for Nagoya at NHK Spring MitsuzawaFootballStadium.
Free kick for Nagoya in their own half.
Can Yokohama FC get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Nagoya's half?
In the minute 82, Yokohama FC make their fourth substitution with Yuki Kobayashi replacing Koki Saito.
Ball safe as Nagoya is awarded a throw-in in their half.
The away team replace Yuki Soma with Ryotaro Ishida.
In the minute 84, Throw-in Nagoya.
Nagoya awarded a free kick in their own half.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Yokohama.
In the minute 85, The away team replace Yutaka Yoshida with Oh Jae-suk.
Free kick for Nagoya in their own half.
Yokohama FC's Takaaki Shichi misses with an attempt on goal.
In the minute 88, Can Nagoya capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Yokohama FC's half?
Ball safe as Nagoya is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Nagoya to take a throw-in in Yokohama FC territory.
Yokohama FC have a goal kick.
Nagoya takes a corner from the right.
The 2nd half is prolonged by 4 minutes of added time.
Corner awarded to Nagoya.
Nagoya to take a throw-in in Yokohama FC territory.
Yokohama FC needs to be cautious. Nagoya have an attacking throw-in.
Throw-in for Yokohama FC in their own half.
Throw-in for Nagoya at NHK Spring MitsuzawaFootballStadium.
Throw-in Nagoya.
It's 3-2 as the referee blows for full-time.
